Name: SocialBrain
HowToAcknowledge:
When using this data please cite:
Tso IF, Rutherford S, Fang Y, Angstadt M, Taylor SF. (2018). The "social brain" is highly sensitive to the mere presence of social information: An automated meta-analysis and an independent study. PLoS ONE. Doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0196503
Funding: This research was partially supported by the National Institute of Mental Health (R01 MH01258 to S.F.T.; K23 MH108823 to I.F.T.)
ReferencesAndLinks: The social brain is highly sensitive to the mere presence of social information: An automated meta-analysis and an independent study
